name: Jumpy Punk - Cyber Jack Flash ~ Future Skate
name_original: Jumpy Punk - Cyber Jack Flash ~ Future Skate
description:
Jumpy Punk! Starring Jack Flash and his CyberPunk friends, is a simple but addicting fun new game. Grind the pavement and collect stacks of cash to help the crew raise money to mod their super powered skateboards.

>Easy Tap and Hold Gameplay
>Hours of fun
>Challenging yet not impossible
>Compete for High Scores in Game Center
>Kid Mode feature for young children to enjoy
>5 Different Characters to collect

Exclusive SoundTrack Produced By: Ko.B Creative
